concept.title: WebHelp Responsive Search Engine
concept.shortdesc: WebHelp Responsive output benefit by its own search engine allowing you to browse your documents without an Internet connection for local publications.

conbody.p: Search engine has two main components:

dd.p: It is also known as spider. This component is active when publish your documentation to WebHelp (transformation time) and it is responsible to create the search index. This component traverses all HTML pages (for DITA topics) to gather information.

dlentry.dd: This component is an interface between user and the search index. It helps the user to search through the search index and display results in the search page.
